ing: 1 cup vanilla soy or almond milk
des: "This warm, whole grain breakfast cereal is delicious with brown sugar or honey and your favorite dried fruit."
ins: In a small sauce pan combine soy milk and Multi-Grain Medley.  Bring to a boil.  Reduce heat to low and simmer 10 minutes, or until all liquid is absorbed.  Stir in brown sugar and fruit.  Serve warm.
